movie.title: The Rewrite
movie.actors: Marisa Tomei, J.K. Simmons, Allison Janney, Hugh Grant
movie.plot: An Oscar-winning writer in a slump leaves Hollywood to teach screenwriting at a college on the East Coast, where he falls for a single mom taking classes there.
movie.tomatoConsensus: The Rewrite's unremarkable plot is enlivened considerably by its likable cast, adding up to a comedy that coasts capably on the charms of Hugh Grant and his co-stars.
